name: Going the Distance An Animation
description: NOTE: DOUBLE CLICK THE GREEN FLAG AND CLOSE OTHER TABS FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE Other note: This is not a game, this is an animation. --- Animation I made for my video production class at school, I had a week to finish this, thankfully I got it done within the deadline. remember to leave a love and/or favorite if you enjoyed voices were made using text to speech --- Credits: Capcom StoneMcKnuckle PostApocolyptica MyInstants.com Vo.Codes NaturalReaders Youtube SoundsResource
